```{r}
library(dplyr)

tabla <- datos %>% 
  select(age,anaemia,diabetes,time) %>% 
  rename(edad = age,anemia =anaemia,veces=time) %>% 
  filter(anemia==1) %>% 
  group_by(diabetes) %>% 
  summarise(promedio = mean(edad))
```
